title: JSW Infrastructure eyes plans for green hydrogen, ammonia plants at its ports
description: JSW Infra's green hydrogen plans include Adani's Vizhinjam port as a hub. Kandla, Paradip, and Tuticorin are future hubs. JSW Energy targets green sector. Focus on connectivity, customer loyalty, third-party business. Aims for 10-12% growth, new acquisitions, Jaigarh port, LPG terminal by 2025. Timeline is uncertain.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
